author: Xbox
description:
You are justice. The Adeptus Arbites are  Warhammer 40,000: Darktide's first class! They enforce the Lex Imperialis – the Imperial Law.  Utterly unforgiving, they persecute heretics and traitors throughout the Emperor’s realm. As an Arbitrator, you are a warrior of the Emperor’s justice, prosecuting crimes against the Imperium with disciplined zeal. Restore order to Tertium with your Cyber-Mastiff and a devastating array of new weaponry.

https://xbox.com/games/store/warhammer-40-000-darktide/9nt3wc6rkbvq

description:
Guided by the knowledge acquired from ransacking Ancient Temples, Flameheart's pursuit of power continues in Sea of Thieves Season 16: Reapers Rule! This first monthly update adds the first on-demand Voyages for The Reaper's Bones, introduces the deployable Cannon of Rage, lets you unearth helpful skeletons and more! Available now.

description:
Lynked: Banner of the Spark is now available on Xbox Series X|S!

Build a bright new world alongside a band of rescued robot buddies! In this colorful action RPG, battle waves of enemies in solo or co-op, then return home and use their parts to craft a thriving town. Assemble your crew and grow stronger with each new adventure!

author: Xbox
description:
Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive are excited to announce the release date and reveal the first gameplay footage for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2’s long-awaited Siege Mode. 

Available for free to all Xbox Series players on June 26, the “Siege” update comes with a new PvE game mode and two new cosmetics DLCs for Season Pass owners.

Check out our Siege mode Teaser!

author: Xbox
description:
Become a monster slayer with The Witcher 3 10th Anniversary special edition controller and celebrate the lasting legacy of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt — available while supplies last. 

Join the School of the Wolf with a design inspired by Geralt’s steel and silver swords alongside Glagolitic-inspired script to embrace the game’s Slavic folklore roots. Add a dash of flair to your gameplay with the wolf medallion logo and iconic red claw marks. Celebrate ten years of killing monsters alongside the White Wolf and reconnect with the critically acclaimed dark fantasy story beloved by millions as you prepare for the start of a new saga.

author: Xbox
description:
A demon begins his HUNT. Become the master of the fist with the Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration! 

The free Akuma hunter layered armor with special actions and Blanka-chan Palico layered armor arrive on May 28, alongside a cosmetic collaboration paid DLC pack. 

Buy now:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/monster-hunter-wilds/9NMT6XFN0LVD

About Monster Hunter Wilds
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on Xbox Series X|S.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 - Special Collaboration Trailer
